name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Twitter Great Again - Twitter Free Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute tweets with a single click. Optimize your Twitter feed easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Twitter Great Again!

Make Twitter Great Again is a 100% FREE Google Chrome extension that allows you to clean up and optimize your Twitter feeds. 

FEATURES:
- New button to easily mark a tweet as "not interesting" (A shortcut for the "I'm not interested in this Tweet" button) ðŸ’©
- New button to easily mute people directly on your Twitter feeds ðŸ¤«
- New button to easily mute people directly on each Twitter profile ðŸ¤«

Tired of seeing tweets you don't like in your Twitter feed ("For you" tab)? No problem, download our free Chrome extension, click the new buttons that appears on every tweet you want to hide (or people you want to mute) and issue resolved. This will help clean up and optimize your Twitter feed like a PRO.

Because the "I'm not interested in this Tweet" button is quite hidden... And the same for the "Mute" button.

Make Twitter Great Again is a (super fast developed BTW) side-project, pure MVP, developed by JosÃ© Pascual for The Open Projects (TOP), the newsletter in which you receive 3 online business ideas analyzed every week.

This Chrome extension adds, when browsing Twitter, 2 new buttons:
- A new ðŸ’© button that allows you to mute any tweet. It is basically a shortcut for the "I'm not interested in this Tweet" button. ["For you" Twitter feed]
- A new ðŸ¤« button that allows you to mute anyone quick and easy. It is basically a shortcut for the "hidden" Mute button. ["For you" + "Following" Twitter feeds]

It also adds a new button on every Twitter profile to easily mute anyone.

Your feedback is super welcome > theopenprojects.top@gmail.com

Let's Make Twitter Great Again!

This free chrome extension is not affiliated any way with Twitter. This extension is not  endorsed, authorized or produced by Twitter. This extension has been developed by hardcore Twitter users.
